body:
Hey hi guys, I´m reaching out due an issue I´m dealing with after using the Ladybug-AdaptiveComfortCalculator. Basically the zones of my model are reporting a percent ofability above 93%, while also reporting 41% of the time to be in extreme weather conditions. Aditionally, I´m also running an analysis with the Ladybug_AdaptiveComfortChart, where the charts are displayed in Rhino, yet the outputs of the component doesn´t provide any data. Any guidance would be appreciated!...
Cheers, Alejandro[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EMVKhgUIcMtAnsWak69RLeNC8ZaTd3v7capup3vSyHw6rgW309bjQ6YpSXFvGGLdYIAvQqZvqChSQ2axLyUPZ*M-tw5SeTvr/Ladybug_AdaptiveComfortCalculatorIssue.png)
